steps.label: started
steps.comment: Only execute if we started it, it may have been started by another server in the mean time
Chain a new task for this queue if possible

steps.label: amountOfRescheduledTasks = 0
steps.comment: If we could not reschedule a task, check that the queue is done

steps.label: classification/code != null
steps.comment: If you set a custom code, use that

steps.label: classification/message != null
steps.comment: If you set a custom message, use that

steps.label: input/queue/concurrency = 0 && !classification/fail
steps.comment: Pause queue if it is a serial queue and we did not set it immediately to failed
Make sure we unlock local lock
Make sure we unlock the global lock

steps.label: started
steps.comment: Only execute if we started it, it may have been started by another server in the mean time
Chain a new task for this queue if possible

steps.label: amountOfRescheduledTasks = 0
steps.comment: If we could not reschedule a task, check that the queue is done

steps.label: started && input/task/taskScheduleId != null
steps.comment: Kickstart scheduler if this was a scheduled task
Kickstart local subscriber to check once more (if not already busy)
